case.name: Meia Fight
case.description: Revy gets into a nude fistfight with Meia.

case.name: Jura Grope
case.description: Revy forcibly inspects Jura's breasts for fakeness by groping them.

case.name: Female Player Focus
case.description: Revy starts dirty-talking the female player....whether she likes it or not.

case.name: Male Player Focus
case.description: Revy starts dirty-talking the male player....whether he likes it or not.

case.name: Music
case.description: Revy asks for the table's music tastes since she forgot her Walkman.

case.name: Killing
case.description: In an effort to talk about something she cares about, Revy asks the table if any of them have ever killed someone.

markers.marker: Revy tells Aella that piano/violin/classical music might make a decent sleep aid at best.
Revy tells HK416 they can do things the business way or the hard way.
Revy will show her butt upon stripping, provided there's no targeted responses.
Revy doesn't know what Caulifla means by "levels."
Revy is dismissive of Caulifla's boasts about her crime life because of what she's wearing.
Revy tells Caulifla to make good on her threats.
Revy tells Caulifla that her operation would go a let smoother if she cut a deal with the Sadala Defense Force.
Revy thinks Caulifla's other-planet business is some kind of nerdy role-play.
Revy is skeptical of "sensing energy."
Revy insists that Caulifla is the one picking fights.
Revy tells Caulifla that she is, unfortunately, sober.
Revy, perceiving a threat from Caulifla, threatens her in turn.
Revy thinks Caulifla's outfit looks tacky.
Revy addresses the female player the first time she strips.
Revy sees that the female player has finished.
Revy pays special attention to the female player in her dirty-talk.
Revy sees that the female player must masturbate.
"What, you think I don't have friends? I got my whore friend Eda, I got Dutch, who signs my checks--maybe I'll melt you into glue."
Revy tells Futaba that Jura's breasts are real.
"Ah Christ, the horse is one of those fuckin' Jesus Freaks who wants everyone to hold hands. Remind me to melt her later."
Revy thinks she can come up with something better to insult than the male player's height, which Ini suggests.
Revy hasn't heard of Joey's favorite bands, as they had just recently been formed in 1995.
Revy asks the table if any of them have ever killed someone.
Revy thinks L'Arachel's classical music isn't energetic enough.
Revy addresses the male player the first time he strips.
Revy sees that the male player has finished.
Revy pays special attention to the male player in her dirty-talk.
Revy sees that the male player must masturbate.
Revy tells Meia that the way to inspire fear is to kill people with a smile on your face.
Revy tells Meia to get over the idea of men writing most classical music, saying they also invented bodysuits to ogle women.
Revy figures Meia is so pale and miserable because her crew's HQ is in an off-planet asteroid field.
Revy tells Meia to stay away from her home city of Roanapur if she wants to tour Earth.
Revy generously offers to share Jura's breasts with Mulan.
Revy asks the table what kind of music they like.
Revy chastizes Nagisa for doubting herself.
"Bitch, I got plenty of friends, and they're all as rotten as I am. Why don't I just melt your face with a heated barrel?"
"And I bet I could melt you down into glue, Secretariat."
Revy sees that the game is down to her and one other player.
Revy still holds a fighting stance after punching Meia.
Revy tells Twilight that Yukio wasn't worth her sympathy.
Revy doesn't care about Trainer's warning that smoking will make her breasts sag.
Revy mentions that the last schoolgirl she saved killed herself.
